Paragraph: Among users of third - generation progestagens , the risk of VTE was higher in users of desogestrel with 20 g ethinyloestradiol than in users of gestodene or desogestrel with 30 g ethinyloestradiol .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| third-generation progestagens |
| desogestrel |
| ethinyloestradiol |

The paragraph mentions "third-generation progestagens," which is a class of progestogens. Desogestrel and gestodene are specific types of progestogens mentioned in the paragraph. Ethinyloestradiol is a specific type of estrogen mentioned in relation to these progestogens.
